name: MAGIX Video
summary: An MXV file is a video saved in the proprietary MAGIX Video (MXV) format, which features minimal compression to maintain a high video quality. MAGIX software users typically export video as MXV files to transfer video between MAGIX applications, such as MAGIX Movie Studio (formerly Movie Edit Pro) and MAGIX Photo Manager.
